title: Build and explore Knowledge Graphs faster with Amazon Neptune using Graph.Build and G.V() – Part 2
text: This is a guest blog by Arthur Bigeard, Founder at gdotv, in partnership with Charles Ivie, Sr Graph Architect at AWS. G.V() is a graph database IDE available for Desktop or on AWS Marketplace, offering extensive graph visualization and querying capabilities for Amazon Neptune and Neptune Analytics. In Part 1 of this series, we demonstrated […]
